text:
eBay | iOS Developers | Portland, OR | Onsite

I work at eBay Classifieds group, where my team is looking for iOS developers. We are a globally distributed team that support apps for more than a dozen countries. Portland is eBay's mobile development hub. We are located in beautiful downtown Portland. Please email me with questions.

https://jobs.ebayinc.com/jobs/2417575-1950/Portland-Oregon-i... https://jobs.ebayinc.com/jobs/2416250-1950/Portland-Oregon-S...
